South African members of parliament were sceptical when the country’s housing minister boasted about her department’s service delivery rate.“The achievements of this department are enormous, even if we are to say it ourselves… To sum up our successes: our daily rate is truly amazing,” Minister Lindiwe Sisulu told members of the human settlements' portfolio committee during her 2017 budget vote speech. “We deliver 1,200 houses per day,” Sisulu repeated twice for emphasis. Some members then started jeering and heckling. Does the housing minister have her numbers straight?
